name: v2.15.0
body:
## What's Changed
* OTP 27 test and compatibility by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/465
* ra_server: handle higher-term AERs in `receive_snapshot` state by @keynslug in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/470
* ra_aux: Expose effective machine version, current term by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/474

## New Contributors
* @keynslug made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/470

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.14.0...v2.15.0

name: v2.14.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `ra_machine:snapshot_installed/4` callback to pass old state by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/467
* Amend ra_machine:snapshot_installed/4 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/468
* Handle calls and queries in receive_snapshot state by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/466


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.6...v2.14.0

name: v2.13.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `ra:key_metrics/2` by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/461
* ra_server: Add a new `last_applied` state query by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/462
* Stop checkpoint validation when encountering a valid checkpoint by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/463
* Kill snapshot process before deleting everything by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/464


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.5...v2.13.6

name: v2.13.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Avoid interrupting Ra system start when pre init fails by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/460


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.4...v2.13.5

name: v2.13.4
body:

* Be more lenient during pre init. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/458


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.3...v2.13.4

name: v2.13.3
body:

* Ensure Ra servers are properly deleted from the dets table by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/457


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.2...v2.13.3

name: v2.13.2
body:

* Fixes for pre-init recovery and handling of gaps in mem tables due to snapshotting by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/456

name: v2.13.1
body:

* Do not update ra_log_snapshot_state from snapshot writer process. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/455


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.0...v2.13.1

name: v2.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `read` to `file:open/2` options in `ra_lib:sync_file/1` by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/452
* Emit the new `local_query` tuple only if query options are set by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/451
* Checkpoint improvements by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/454


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.12.0...v2.13.0

name: v2.13.0-pre.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `read` to `file:open/2` options in `ra_lib:sync_file/1` by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/452
* Emit the new `local_query` tuple only if query options are set by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/451

name: v2.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Return an error if a `call` is unsupported by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/449
* Add `condition` option to local queries by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/450


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.11.0...v2.12.0

name: v2.11.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Prevent non-voting (new and not-yet-caught-up) replicas from becoming cluster leader in certain scenarios by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/435
* Exclude `non_voter` server from quorum calculation by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/427
* Sync name.dets to disk by @visciang in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/443
* Heapsize config by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/444
* coordination_SUITE: Improve wait condition in `segment_writer_or_wal_crash_leader/1` by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/446
* Fix a bug where the leader is never elected even if the majority of the members are alive. by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/442
* WAL: drop entries with indexes lower or equal to the last snapshot by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/445
* Fix bug where cluster_change_permitted flag is incorrect by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/447
* Add ra_machine:snapshot_installed/2 callback. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/448


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.10.1...v2.11.0

name: v2.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Checkpoints by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/415
* ra_SUITE: Fix flake in consistent_query_leader_change by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/423
* Rename ra_log snapshot_interval parameter to min_snapshot_interval by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/422
* New handle_aux/5 API that provides a better and safer API into Ra internals. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/414
* Add reply_mode to command meta data by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/425
* Add a gauge for the effective machine version in ra_counters by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/426
* Update the OCI workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/431
* When using multi statem call only retry for certain errors. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/433
* Fail the OCI workflow if the ra version is not injected properly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/434
* Fix crash caused by receiving `#append_entries_reply{success=false}` from unknown peer by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/432
* Improve Ra server resilience when log infrastructure encounters faults by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/428


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.9.1...v2.10.0

name: v2.10.0-pre.3
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.10.0-pre.2...v2.10.0-pre.3

name: v2.10.0-pre.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Checkpoints by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/415
* ra_SUITE: Fix flake in consistent_query_leader_change by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/423
* Rename ra_log snapshot_interval parameter to min_snapshot_interval by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/422
* New handle_aux/5 API that provides a better and safer API into Ra internals. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/414
* Add reply_mode to command meta data by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/425
* Add a gauge for the effective machine version in ra_counters by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/426
* Update the OCI workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/431
* When using multi statem call only retry for certain errors. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/433
* Fail the OCI workflow if the ra version is not injected properly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/434
* Fix crash caused by receiving `#append_entries_reply{success=false}` from unknown peer by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/432
* Improve Ra server resilience when log infrastructure encounters faults by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/428


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.9.1...v2.10.0-pre.2

name: v2.7.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix otp version indentifier to match rabbitmq-server main by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/400
* Type specs: maybe/1 => option/1 by @michaelklishin in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/402
* Copyright update. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/403
* Handle post_init and unknown terminate crash by @SimonUnge in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/404
* ra_machine: Allow the `version/0` callback to return 0 by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/399
* Aten 0.6.0 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/406

## New Contributors
* @SimonUnge made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/404

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1

name: v2.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle shutdown exits in gen_statem:call/3 by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/388
* Add a release workflow for publishing to bazel-central-registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/390
* Use override_module instead of override_repository in oci workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/392
* Add rabbitmq/bazel-central-registry@erlang-packages bzlmod registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/394
* Seshat 0.6.0 + new ra:key_metrics/1 function to ensure key metrics are retrievable even when a ra server is recovering (or otherwise blocked) by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/386
* Add automation to publish to our bzlmod registry on release by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/395
* Commit down commands as low priority. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/396
* Use seshat from bazel-central-registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/391
* Adjust triggering for the erlang.yml workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/397
* Non-voters and automatic promotion by @illotum in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/375

## New Contributors
* @illotum made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/375

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.6.3...v2.7.0

name: v2.7.0-pre.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle shutdown exits in gen_statem:call/3 by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/388
* Add a release workflow for publishing to bazel-central-registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/390
* Use override_module instead of override_repository in oci workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/392
* Add rabbitmq/bazel-central-registry@erlang-packages bzlmod registry by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/394
* Seshat 0.6.0 + new ra:key_metrics/1 function to ensure key metrics are retrievable even when a ra server is recovering (or otherwise blocked) by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/386
* Add automation to publish to our bzlmod registry on release by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/395
* Commit down commands as low priority. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/396


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.6.3...v2.7.0-pre.2

name: v2.6.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Avoid growing notifications map during recovery by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/385


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.6.2...v2.6.3

name: v2.6.2
body:
## Bug Fixes

 * Make sure segment writers emit stats correctly when multiple Ra-based systems are running side by side.
   
   GitHub issue: [#376](https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/376)


## Enhancements

 * A safer way to write out Ra node internal configuration files (state).

    GitHub issue: [#382](https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/382)

 * Documentation typo fixes

    Contributed by @visciang.

   GitHub issue: [#379](https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/379)

name: v2.6.1
body:
## Changes from 2.5.x

### Add API to force a server into single member mode

GitHub issue: [#306](https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/306)

###  Fix snapshot installation CRC failure on Erlang 26

GitHub issue: [#369](https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/369)

name: v2.5.1
body:
## What's Changed

* Don't rely on the order of lists returned by maps by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/363
* Fix the mock in the test by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/364
* Allow non-leaders to process apply effects by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/365


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.5.0...v2.5.1
